# ReflectionHelpers.IsDerived method

Determines if the type inherits from given type.

```csharp
public static bool IsDerived(Type reflectedType, Type parentType)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| reflectedType | Reflected type. |
| parentType | Parent type |

## Return Value

True when the type implements given interface.
